metadata.title: Kanjibox
metadata.description: Une appli simple d'apprentissage du Japonais

welcome.description: Home page of Kanji Box, below are the recently recorded kanji. To view/edit kanji or words, click on the buttons below.

addKanji.description: To add a kanji, please provide its value. You can optionally let the app handle the detection of various readings and translations (in English).

addWord.description: To add a word, please provide its value, its furigana transcription, and its translation.
